Package player

Class Camera

java.lang.Object
player.Camera
Direct Known Subclasses:
Player
public class Camera extends Object
This class represents the camera on the screen that you can use to move/look around
Version:
05262024
Author:
Dhruv Solanki

  • Constructor Details

    • Camera

      public Camera()
      Creates a new instance of a camera

    • Camera

      public Camera(float speed, float xSensitivity, float ySensitivity, float friction, float fov, float viewDistance)
      Creates a new instance of a camera
      Parameters:
      speed - The speed of teh camera
      xSensitivity - Mouse sensitivity on the x-axis
      ySensitivity - Mouse sensitivity on the y-axis
      friction - The amount of friction the player experiences while moving
      fov - The player's field of view
      viewDistance - How far the player can look in the distance

  • Method Details

      Parameters:
      g - The PApplet in which the camera is located at
